thread.title: Tammy Lewis
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Tammy Lewis

author: Tammy Lewis
title: Tammy Lewis
text: Kudos on being discreet; your packages look like regular boxes. I buy your product for my Mother with ALZHEIMER'S. She likes the feel of the under garments. I have to say they hold her over during the night not many leaks.I like that you send samples to try with perches. I tell everyone I know about your website. I'm so glad I found you! Thank You
